description: Do more with a high-definition webcam. The HP Webcam HD-3100 is great for video chatting, capturing photos and recording videos. Count on TrueVision for improved video quality in low-light conditions and use built-in adaptive lighting to automatically adjust to changing light. Plus, view accurate, true-to-life color thanks to automatic white balance. With this widescreen webcam, you can also fit multiple people in your picture or video at the same time. Face-tracking helps make sure that you stay in the center of every frame.
title: HP Webcam HD-3100 - 720P Widescreen Webcam with TrueVision
